## android

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.netflix.mediaclient

~~~
adb install-multiple (Get-ChildItem *.apk)
~~~

results:

~~~
Sdk 35 crash after 12 seconds
Sdk 34 crash after 12 seconds

Sdk 31
Sdk 30
